actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry (without written report).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 95-242.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: An original resolution reported authorizing additional committee expenditures.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 95-242) Authorizes the Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry to make expenditures, not to exceed $300,300, for hearings and investigations, from the contingent fund of the Senate.

titles.title: An original resolution reported authorizing additional committee expenditures.
